Database Classes¶

class Database.DBInstance(handle)¶

Bases: object

Provides a specified wrapper for sqlite3 queries

Parameters

handle (str) – location of sqlite database (can be :memory:)

_is_row_correct(column_names, row)¶

internal method to validate whether a row string matches the table row at the moment only checks length of the two arguments is the same, in future will be more thorough

Parameters

  • column_names (list of str) – names of the columns to check against

  • row (list of str) – names of columns provided by user

_save()¶

internal method for commiting changes to the database

create_table(table_name, **kwargs)¶

Create a new table in the database.

Parameters

  • table_name (str) – name of table

  • **kwargs (dict) – keys are columns, values are datatypes

get_column_info(table_name)¶

method for getting the column info of a table

Parameters

table_name (str) – name of the table to get the column names of

Returns

list of column names

insert_entire_row(table_name, data)¶

insert a row of values into a given table

Parameters

  • table_name (str) – name of table

  • data (list) – items are data values

Raises

Exception(“Bad row format.”)

select_columns(table_name, column_list)¶

select whole column from table

Parameters

  • table_name (str) – name of table

  • column (str) – name of column to select from

Returns

list of tuples with items from column [(x1, y1, …), (x2, y2, …), …]
